chapter.title: Apache HBase APIs
chapter.para: This chapter provides information about performing operations using HBase native APIs. This information is not exhaustive, and provides a quick reference in addition to the User API Reference. The examples here are not comprehensive or complete, and should be used for purposes of illustration only.
Apache HBase also works with multiple external APIs. See for more information.
